name: CurrencyConverter
0:
”Alexa, begin Currency Converter”
”Alexa, ask currency converter to convert 15 Mexican Pesos to Argentine Pesos”
”Alexa, get me exchange from Euro in currency converter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: currency converter
des:
This skill uses USA Dollar as currency base. It is able to calculate 148 currencies exchange providing a quick answer.
The countries and currencies accepted are:
United Arab Emirates-United Arab Emirates Dirham
Afghanistan-Afghan Afghani
Albania-Albanian Lek
Armenia-Armenian Dram
Angola-Angolan Kwanza
Argentina-Argentine Peso
